Value.label: Wake up 10 minutes on Power On
Value.Help: Stay awake for 10 minutes after batteries are inserted

Value.label: On time
Value.Help: How long should the device associated to multi sensor keep state On before sending it Off command (if the value is bigger than 255, the value would be rounded to next integer in minutes)

Value.label: Command Options
Value.Help: Which commands to send when PIR motion sensor triggered OZW Ideal Value is Binary Sensor Report

Value.label: Reporting Threshold
Value.Help: Enable/disable the selective reporting only when measurements reach a certain threshold or percentage set in the threshold settings. This is used to reduce network traffic.

Value.label: Temperature Reporting Threshold
Value.Help: Threshold change in temperature to induce an automatic report. Note: 1. When the unit is Celsius, threshold=Value. 2. When the unit is Fahrenheit, threshold=Value*1.8. The accuracy is 0.1. 3. The high byte is the part of integer, the low byte is the fractional part.

Value.label: Humidity Reporting Threshold
Value.Help: Threshold change in humidity to induce an automatic report. Note: The accuracy is 0.1. The high byte is the part of integer, the low byte is the fractional part.

Value.label: Luminance Reporting Threshold
Value.Help: Threshold change in luminance to induce an automatic report.

Value.label: Battery Reporting Threshold
Value.Help: Threshold change in battery level to induce an automatic report. Note: The accuracy is 0.1. The high byte is the part of integer, the low byte is the fractional part.

Value.label: Low Temp Alarm
Value.Help: Enable/disable to send the alarm report of low temperature(Less than 15 Degress C)

Value.label: Group 1 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 1. Bitsets: 0 -> Battery report, 5 -> Temperature, 6 -> Humidity, 7 -> Luminosity

Value.label: Group 2 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 2. Bitsets: 0 -> Battery report, 5 -> Temperature, 6 -> Humidity, 7 -> Luminosity

Value.label: Group 3 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 3. Bitsets: 0 -> Battery report, 5 -> Temperature, 6 -> Humidity, 7 -> Luminosity

Value.label: Group 1 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 1. 1 to 2678400 seconds

Value.label: Group 2 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 2. 1 to 2678400 seconds

Value.label: Group 3 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 3. 1 to 2678400 seconds
